sourceDesc.p: M.R. James, Descriptive Catalogue of the Manuscripts in the Library of Corpus Christi College, Cambridge 1912

projectDesc.p: The James Catalogue was digitized then marked up following the TEI P5 Guidelines. The customized model was provided by Giuliano Di Bacco, stored in an ODD file (parkerweb.xml): the latter was written by GDB using ROMA vers. 2.x, with manual adaptations. The ODD file is used as a source to compile the actual schema used to validate the xml: it is advisable to compile it in RelaxNG sintax (parkerweb.rnc) through ROMA.

head.title: Letter of Henry VIII, now missing

ab.supplied: Blank sheet replacing missing letter of Henry VIII listed in contents list on f. ir

head.title: Letter of Martin Bucer to Edward VI, 1550
Epistola Martini Buceri ad Edwardum VI

ab.quote: mittit regi duos libros quos conscripsit de regno Christi restituendo, eumque hortatur ut veram fidem Dei et ejus ministros semper foveat et protegat: data Cantabrigiae 12 kalendas Novembri 1550

msItem.ab: Cf. Gasquet and Bishop, Edward VI etc. p. 301 note

head.title: Letter in German dated August 1538
Epistola Germanica

msItem.ab: refers to Johann Forster preacher at Augsburg, dated August (15)38 signed Burgomaister vnnd Paumaister ... zu Augspurg: see a Latin version in MS 122. 14

head.title: Letter of Frederick III, Elector Palatine, to Matthew Parker, 12 February 1568
Epistola Frederici electoris Palatini ad Matthaeum Parker archiepiscopum Cantuariensem; in qua commendat ei Immanuelem Trimellium legatum suum: data Heidelbergae 12 Februarii 1568
Letter of Matthew Parker to Frederick III, Elector Palatine, 23 March 1568
Responsio archiepiscopi ad electorem, data Lambethi 23 Martii 1568
Safe conduct granted by Charles IX of France for those attending the assembly at Poissy, 25 July 1561
A safe-conduct granted by Charles IX. king of France, to all persons coming to the assembly at Poissy, dated at St. Germain's July 25, 1561
Letter of Emperor Charles V to the prelates, abbots and clergy of Cologne, 12 October 1544

Epistola Caroli V. imperatoris ad praelatos abbates et clerum civitatis Coloniensis in qua fautoribus novi cultus se offensum ostendit, et hortatur ut in pristina religionis forma perstent: data Bruxelli 12 Octobris 1544
Autograph letter of Edward VI to Catherine Parr, 30 May 1548
Epistola scripta manu propria serenissimi regis Edwardi VI. ad dominam Katherinam reginam relictam regis Henrici VIII. data 30 Maii

msItem.incipit: Cum non procul abs te abessem
msItem.ab: No. xliv in Nichols' Literary Remains of Edward VI (I p. 44)

head.title: Autograph letter of Anne Boleyn to her father, Sir Thomas Boleyn
Lettre d'Anne de Boullan a son pere

msItem.incipit: Monsr je antandue par vostre lettre

head.title: Latin translation of a letter from Anne Boleyn to her father, Sir Thomas Boleyn
Ejusdem epistolae versio Latina
Letter of Thomas Cranmer to Martin Bucer
Epistola Cranmeri archiepiscopi Cantuariensi ad Martinum Bucerum, in qua consolatur eum de morte Fagii et dicit se misisse xxvii libros viduae Fagii solvendas, data Lambethi ultima Novembris
Letter of Stephen Gardiner, chancellor of the University of Cambridge, to the vice-chancellor and masters of the university

Epistola Stephani Gardiner episcopi Wintoniensi academiae Cantabrigiensis cancellarii ad vice-cancellarium et coetum magistrorum regentium et non regentium; in qua graviter invehit in eos qui spreta sua autoritate antiquam Graecae pronuntiationis normam non observant, et de tragoedia coram eis publice recitata queritur: data London 18 Maii

ab.supplied: pp. 33-34 are blank except for an address and formed the wrapper for item 11

head.title: Letter of John Skip, Bishop of Hereford, to Matthew Parker
Letter from John Skyp bishop of Hereford to Dr. Parker dean of Stoke, acquainting him that matters go on slowly in the convocation: dated Westminster May 11
Letter of Edmund Bonner, Bishop of London, desiring members of the University of Cambridge to preach at St Paul's Cross, London
Letter from Edmund Bonner bishop of London to  , desiring him to exhort the members of the university to take their turns in preaching at St. Paul's cross, dated October 9
Letter of Hugh Latimer to Dr Green
Epistola Hugonis Latimeri ad doctorem Green gymnasiarcham, in qua orat ut magister Wynfylde in locum Lufvelli succedat: data Kymboltaniae postridie Edwardi
Letter of John Cheke to Martin Bucer, 11 May 1550

Epistola Ioannis Cheki ad Martinum Bucerum in qua gratulatur ei quod valetudinem recuperasset, et dicit se continuo archiepiscopum hortari, ut Sleidani se sedulum patronum praebeat: data Grenvici 11 Maii, 1550

ab.ref: J. Goodwin, Cheke's Gospel of Matthew 1843, Appendix no. 3

head.title: Letter of Richard Morrison to Martin Bucer
Epistola Ricardi Morysini ad eundem de statu rerum in Germania: data ex aedibus ducissae Suffolciae
Letter of Martin Bucer to John Cheke, 1550
Epistola Martini Buceri ad Ioannem Chekum

ab.quote: mittit ei libros suos de Christi regno restituendo, et servum suum in Galliam redeuntem ei commendat: data 12 kalendas Novembri 1550

head.title: Letter of Walter Haddon to Martin Bucer
Epistola Gualteri Haddon ad Martinum Bucerum, in qua de infirma sua valetudine fuse agit: data 1 Septembris
Letter of Thomas Goodrich, bishop of Ely, to Dr John Edmunds, master of Peterhouse

Letter from Thomas Goodrich bishop of Ely to Dr. Edmunds master of Peterhouse, declaring to him the kings pleasure, that one of the society should preach every Sunday in their parish church, and make known to the people his majesties title of supreme head of the church and his renunciation of the usurped power of the pope: dated Somersham June 27
Autograph letter of Desiderius Erasmus to Martin Bucer, 1527
Epistola Erasmi ad Martinum Bucerum, in qua rationes adfert cur noluerit ecclesiae reformatae se adjungere: data Basileae, natali D. Martini, 1527

msItem.ab: Liber xix, Epistola 72. Autograph letter pp. 57-58, 63-64, with transcript (pp. 59-62)

head.title: Two letters of Martin Bucer to Matthew Parker
Duae epistolae Buceri ad Parkerum
Letter of Martin Bucer to Matthew Parker, written shortly before Bucer's death
Epistola novissima omnium, quam scripsit Bucerus paulo ante mortem suam, in qua orat Parkerum ut det ei mutuo x coronatos
Will and Testament of Martin Bucer, dated 23 January 1548, with codicil dated 22 February 1551
Testamentum Martini Buceri factum Argentorati 23 Januarii 1548, cum codicillo Cantabrigiae facto 22 Februarii 1551
Letter of Sir John Cheke to Matthew Parker, 1551
Letter from sir John Cheke to Dr. Parker, condoling with him on the death of Bucer, and informing him that he had spoken in favour of his widow to the lords of the council, dated Westminster 1551

msItem.ab: Correspondence XXXV, J. Goodwin, Cheke's Gospel of Matthew 1843, Appendix no. 4

head.title: Letter of Sir John Cheke promising his assistance to secure a pension for his unnamed correspondent
Letter from the same to Dr   , promising him to exert his interest to procure him a pension, dated Westminster June 7

msItem.ab: Correspondence XXXVIII, J. Goodwin, Cheke's Gospel of Matthew 1843, Appendix no. 2

head.title: Letter of Wibrandis Bucer to Matthew Parker and Walter Haddon

Epistola Wibrandae Buceri ad doctores Parker et Haddon Germanice scripta cum ejusdem versione Latina, in qua reddit eis rationem pecuniarum quas ab Anglia discedens acceperat: data Gravelyn die veneris
Letter of Wibrandis Bucer to Matthew Parker and Walter Haddon concerning the distribution of Martin Bucer's goods after his death, 23 February 1552

Epistola ejusdem ad eosdem, in qua eos certiores facit, distributionem bonorum mariti ejus defuncti brevi esse faciendam juxta testamentum ejus; et nonnullas in ea re ex legibus Argentinensibus ortas difficultates enarrat: data Argentinae 23 Februarii 1552
Certificate of Ulrich Chelius and Conrad Hubert concerning the distribution of Martin Bucer's goods after his death, dated 20 July 1553
Certificatio Ulrici Chelii et Conradi Huberti de eadem bonorum distributione, acta Argentorati 20 Julii, 1553
Letter of Ulrich Chelius and Conrad Hubert to Matthew Parker and Walter Haddon
Epistola eorundem, in qua Parkerum et Haddonum rogant ut reliquum pecuniae Bucero debitae expediatur et mittatur
Letter of Wibrandis Bucer to Martin Bucer
Epistola Wibrandae Buceri ad maritum suum Germanice scripta cum ejusdem versione Latina, in qua memorat machinationes papistarum quando Argentinam primum rediit: data Thermis postridie Ioannis
Letter of Christopher Stael to Martin Bucer
Epistola Christopheri Stael priori annexa, in qua petit consilium a Bucero, utrum cum ecclesia permanere an cum matre discedere debeat: data Argentinae 30 Junii
Letter of attorney given by Wibrandis Bucer to Matthew Parker and Walter Haddon
Literae attornatus datae a Wibranda Bucero, doctoribus Parker et Haddon: Cantabrigiae 20 Aprilis 5 Edwardi VI
Letter of Wibrandis Bucer to Matthew Parker and Walter Haddon, 15 July 1553

Epistola Wibrandae Buceri ad eosdem; in qua eos certiores facit distributionem tandem esse factam, et maximas eis agit gratias pro humanitate et benevolentia erga se et maritum defunctum: data Argentinae 15 Julii, 1553

ab.supplied: This is followed by the continuation of item 31 (pp. 95-98) and item 30 (pp. 99-102)

head.title: Letter of John a Lasco to Martin Bucer, 1550
Epistola Iohannis Alasco ad Martinum Bucerum, in qua promittit se brevi ad eum venturum; et quaedam narrat de rerum statu in Anglia, Polonia et Germania: data Lambeth postridie Iohannis Baptismi 1550
Letter of John a Lasco to Martin Bucer, 1545
Epistola Iohannis Alasco ad eundem, de natura coenae Domini, data Bonnae pridie Iohannis Baptismi 1545
Letter of Peter Martyr to Martin Bucer, 11 November 1550

Epistola Petri Martyri ad Martinum Bucerum, in qua respondet quaestioni sibi propositae, quamdiu existimaret fidem Christi generalem confusam et implicitam satis fuisse ad hominum salutem; et suadet ut concors de re sacramentaria fiat confessio ut proposuit Alasco ab eis et Bernhardino subscribenda : data Oxoniis Novembris 11, 1550
Letter of Peter Martyr to Martin Bucer, 6 September 1550
Epistola Martyri ad eundem, in qua hortatur ut non det se in disputationem nisi adsint judices idonei; et fuse agit de rebus Oxoniensibus et Argentinensibus: data Oxoniis 6 Septembris 1550
Letter of Peter Martyr to Martin Bucer, 10 January
Epistola Martyri ad eundem de libro precum communium, et de Hoppero et Smitheo, data Lambethae 10 Januarii
Letter of Peter Martyr to Martin Bucer, 11 June 1550
Epistola Martyri ad eundem, in qua multa de Smitheo et libellis ejus, data Oxoniis 11 Junii 1550
Letter from Richard Smith to Matthew Parker
Letter from Richard Smith to the archbishop of Canterbury, expressing his sorrow for having written his book de coelibatu patrum, dated Oxford December 2
Letter from Matthew Parker to the lords of the council concerning Richard Smith
Letter from Dr. Parker to the lords of the council, acquainting them that Dr. Smith is ready to acknowledge the queen's supremacy, dated Lambeth August 27
Letter from Richard Smith to Matthew Parker
Letter from Richard Smith, to archbishop Parker, petitioning to have one of his bondsmen released from his bond

ab.quote: A marginal note adds that notwithstanding his fair promises he fled to Paris, [pp. 115, 116 absent]

ab.supplied: pp. 115-116 are blank leaves inserted later

head.title: Letter of Peter Martyr to Martin Bucer, 31 March 1550
Epistola Petri Martyri ad Martinum Bucerum, in qua condolet cum Bucero de adversa ejus valetudine: data Oxonii ultima Martii 1550
Letter of Martin Luther to [unknown], 2 December 1537

Epistola Martini Lutheri ad consules Sculthetas majores civesque civitatum Helvetiae, in qua respondit et assensum suum praebet articulis quibusdam sibi missis de concordia in fide stabilienda: data Wittembergae 2 Decembris 1537

msItem.ab: Copy, ed. de Wette V 83, no. 1784

head.title: Autograph letter of Martin Luther to Martin Bucer, 6 December 1537
Epistola Lutheri ad Bucerum cum precedente epistola missa, die Sancti Nicholai, 1537

msItem.ab: Autograph, ed. de Wette V 83, no. 1785

Epistola Matthiae Flaccii Illyrici ad Mattheum Cantuariensem de antiquis ecclesiae monumentis, data Jenae 22 Maii, 1561

Epistola Bernhardi Nigri ecclesiasticae historiae collectoris ad eundem, data Londini 30 Junii, 1561

Epistola Thomae Blaurerii ad Bucerum de statu rerum Germanicarum, data Constantiae 11 Februarii 1547
Letter of Johann Sturm to Martin Bucer
Epistola Iohannis Sturmii ad eundem, in qua deplorat mortem protectoris, et adversam Buceri valetudinem, data Argentorati pridie Nativitatis
Autograph letter of Philipp Melanchthon to Martin Bucer, 14 November 1547

Epistola Philippi Melanchton ad eundem, in qua orat ut scripta sua et Calvini et Sturmii mittat cuidam docto Polono; et quaedam ei narrat ex visione coelesti ????????? deprompta : data 14 Novembris 1547
Letter of Johann Sleidan to Martin Bucer, 20 May 1550
Epistola Sleidani ad eundem de statu rerum ecclesiasticarum, data 20 Maii, 1550
Autograph letter of Philipp Melanchthon to Martin Bucer
Epistola Philippi Melanchton ad eundem de rebus ecclesiasticis, data 4 Augusti
Excerpts from Basil in Greek in the hand of Philipp Melanchthon
Excerpta Graeca ex Basilio per Melanchton
Letter of Martin Luther to the ministers of the church in Augsburg, 7 August 1536, copied by Philipp Melanchthon
Epistola Lutheri ad Augustinae ecclesiae ministros, in qua gratulatur eis de concordia inter se stabilita, data 7 Augusti 1536

msItem.ab: Copy by Melanchthon: ed. de Wette V no. 1728

head.title: Autograph letter of John Calvin to Martin Bucer, 1551
Epistola Iohannis Calvin ad Bucerum ejus post mortem reddita, in qua deplorat dissensiones in Germania ortas et suadet concordiam praesertim de sacramento: data Genevae 7 kalendas Martii, 1551

msItem.ab: Autograph. Opera ed. Baum etc. no. 4157, Gorham 235

head.title: Letter of Johannes Bugenhagen concerning the reformation of the Danish church, 1538
Epistola Iohannis Pomerani de reformatione ecclesiae apud Danos, data Copenhagen feria secunda post purificationem, 1538
Letter of Johann Brenz to Martin Bucer
Epistola Iohannis Brentii ad Bucerum, in qua gratulatur ei quod salvus in Angliam venisset, et narrat ei statum religionis in Germania, data 27 Augusti
Letter of Johann Sleidan to Martin Bucer, 28 September 1549
Epistola Sleidani ad eundem de re sacramentaria, data Bonae 28 Septembris 1549
Letter of Johannes Oecolampadius to Martin Bucer
Epistola Iohannis Oecolampadii ad eundem, data Basileae quarta Paschae
Letter of Ulrich Zwingli to Wolfgang Capito and Martin Bucer
Epistola Zuinglii ad Capitonem et Bucerum, in qua commendat eis juvenem quendam
Letter of Johannes Oecolampadius to Martin Bucer
Epistola Oecolampadii ad Bucerum, dated Basileae 19 Augusti
Articles of unanimity in faith signed at Karlstadt, 1539
Articuli pro consensu et unanimitate in fide a Carlostadio subscripti A. D. 1539
Letter of Wolfgang Capito to Nicholas Heath, 1537
Epistola Capitonis ad Nicolaum Hetteum (Heath), data 17 kalendas Marti, 1537
Two letters of Heinrich Bullinger to Martin Bucer, 1 September 1537 and 15 December 1537
Duae epistolae Bullingeri ad Bucerum, data 1 Septembris et 15 Decembris 1537, in quibus fuse agit de disputatione cum Luthero orta de sancta coena

ab.supplied: The second letter continues on pp. 185-186

head.title: Letter of Heinrich Bullinger and Walther, pastor of Tegernsee to Edmund Grindal and Robert Horne, 10 September 1566

Epistola Bullingeri et Gualtheri Tigurinae ecclesiae pastorum ad Grindallum episcopum Londinensem et Hornum episcopum Wintoniensem, data Tiguri 10 Septembris 1566, in qua de multis superstitionibus in ecclesia Anglicana toleratis queruntur, viz. de signo crucis in baptismo, de genuflexione in sancta coena, &c.
Letter of Heinrich Bullinger to Martin Bucer, 10 January 1536
Epistola Bullingeri ad Bucerum, data 10 Januarii 1536, in qua se excusat quod conventum cum Luthero habendum ad stabiliendam concordiam dissuaserit
Letter of Heinrich Bullinger to Martin Bucer, 31 August 1549
Epistola Bullingeri ad eundem, in qua inter alia memorat concordiam inter Calvinum et ecclesiam Tigurinam stabilitam: data Tiguri ultima Augusti 1549
Letter of Wolfgang Musculus and other pastors to Martin Bucer
Epistola Wolfgangi Musculi et aliorum pastorum ecclesiae Gallicanae ad eundem, in qua respondent quibusdam articulis inter se et Anglicanos theologos controversis
Letter of Johann Aepinus to Martin Bucer
Epistola Ioannis Ćpini ad eundem, in qua gratulatur ei quod tutum hospitium in Anglia reperisset, et multa ei narrat de statu ecclesiae in Germania, data Hamburgo 29 Julii
Letter of Joachim Vadian to Martin Bucer, 1536

Epistola loachimi Vadiani ad eundem, in qua gratulatur ei quod fama, quae de ejus apostasia pervulgabatur, reperta esset falsa; et narrat quam sincere ipse cum Lutheranis egerit in libro quem jam erat editurus, data pridie Nonas Augusti 1536
Letter of Guillaume Farel to Martin Bucer, 22 July 1550
Epistola Gulielmi Farelli ad eundem de statu rerum ecclesiasticarum in Germania, data Neocom. 22 Julii, 1550
Letter of Oswald Myconius to Martin Bucer, 1549
Epistola Os. Michonii ad eundem, in qua multa de rebus ecclesiasticis in Germania, data Basileae Decembris 1549
Letter of John Mey to Martin Bucer, 1546
Epistola Iohannis Mey ad eundem, in qua multa narrat de disputatione orta de natura sanctae coenae et de moribus flagitiosis cujusdam Billici monachi Coloniensis: data kalendis Maii, 1546
Letter of Oswald Myconius to Martin Bucer, 29 May 1550
Epistola Os. Michonii ad eundem, in qua deplorat Buceri adversam valetudinem et tristem ecclesiae Argentinensis statum, data Basileae 29 Maii, 1550
Letter of George Major to Martin Bucer, 19 August 1550
Epistola Georgii Majoris ad Bucerum de statu rerum ecclesiasticarum in Germania et de concilio generali Wittembergae, data 19 Augusti 1550
Letter of Alexander Ales to Martin Bucer, 1550

Epistola Alexandri Alesii ad eundem, in qua orat ut stipendium sibi ab archiepiscopo promissum solvendum curet, et multa narrat de bello Magdeburgensi et caeteris rebus Germanicis, data kalendis Septembri 1550
Letter of Johann Clarenbach
Epistola Iohannis Clarebachii ad  , in qua liberalitatem ejus implorat
Letter of Valentin Paceus to Martin Bucer, 1550
Epistola Valentini Pacei ad Bucerum de statu rerum ecclesiasticarum, data Lipsii post. Oculi 1550
Letter of Johannes Pretorius to Martin Bucer, 22 November 1550
Epistola Iohannis Pretorii ad eundem, in qua orat ut quaedam scriberet de strage Argentina, et ipse multa de rebus Magdeburgensibus narrat, data Stolbergae 22 Novembris 1550
Letter of Johann Marbach to Martin Bucer, 25 December 1549
Epistola Iohannis Marbachii ad eundem de rebus Argentinensibus, data Argentinae 25 Decembris 1549
Letter of Sebastian Italus to Matthew Parker, 16 January 1566
Epistola Sebastiani Itali ad Mattheum Parker archiepiscopum Cantuariensem, in qua orat ut ejus inopiae subveniat, data Londini 16 Januarii 1566
Letter of the pastors of the church of Sandwich to Matthew Parker, 9 January 1566
Epistola pastorum ecclesiae Sandvicensis ad eundem, in qua maximas ei agunt gratias, quod illius cura et autoritate concordia in sua ecclesia jam esset stabilita, data 9 Januarii 1566
Letter of Wilhelm Klebitz to Matthew Parker, 20 July 1562
Epistola Wilhelmi Klebitzii ad eundem, in qua magnopere orat ut librum suum jam excussum et quorundam autoritate suppressum in lucem emittere permittatur, data Wigorniae 20 Julii, 1562
Terms of the reconciliation within the church at Sandwich signed by the minister and elders, January 1566 ?
Forma pacificationis ecclesiae Sandwicensis a ministris et senioribus subscripta
Letter of Rudolph Walther to John Whitgift, 24 February 1573
Epistola Rodolphi Gualtheri ad doctorem Uuitgiftum collegii Trinitatis praepositum, in qua gratias ei agit pro beneficiis in filium collatis, data Tiguri 24 Februarii 1573
Letter of Anthony Rodolph le Chevalier to Archbishop Matthew Parker, September 1569
Literae Roberti Cevallerii ad M. Parker archiepiscopum Cantuariensem, data Cantabrigiae 5 Sept. 1569
Letter of Christopher Stael to Martin Bucer
Epistola Christophori Stael ad Bucerum, de causa Philippi et Ćpini tum in aula pendente
Letter from the pastors of the church in Strasbourg to Martin Bucer, Peter Martyr and Paul Fagius

Epistola pastorum ecclesiae Argentorati ad eundem, Petrum Martyrum et Paulum Fagium, in qua gratulatur eis quod in regnum vera religione florentissimum pervenissent, et omnia fausta et felicia eis exoptant et precantur
Letter from Conrad Hubert to A.F. [i.e. Martin Bucer] and Paul Fagius
Epistola Conradi Huthberti ad A. F. et P. F. de rebus in Germania transactis post eorum inde decessum, data Rocassii(?) 2 Septembris
Letter of Immanuel Tremellius to Matthew Parker
Epistola Immanuelis Tremellii ad Mattheum Parkerum, data Londini 29 Junii
Letter of Martin Faber to Martin Bucer
Epistola Martini Fabri ad Bucerum, in qua enarrat colloquium cum domino Alasco habitum de sacramento, data Londini die Pentecostes
Letter of Johann Gropper to Martin Bucer, 8 August 1542
Epistola Iohannis Gropperi ad eundem, in qua se excusat quod minus frequenter scripserit, et calamitosum religionis statum deplorat, data Coloniae 8 Augusti 1542
Letter of Francisco de Enzinas to Martin Bucer, 15 January 1550
Epistola Dryandri ad eundem, in qua narrat sinistros quosdam rumores de Bucero per Germaniam sparsos, et orat ut se et familiam suam magistratui commendet, data Basileae 15 Januarii 1550
Letter of Johannes Sapidus to Martin Bucer
Epistola Johanni Sapidi ad eundem, in qua absentiam ejus deplorat
Letter of Georg Witzel to Martin Bucer, 18 December 1538
Epistola Georgii Vincelii ad eundem, in qua orat ne eum quem uxor patronum indicavit, adversarium sentiat: data Lipsiae 18 Decembris 1538
Letter of Jacob Uttenhove to Martin Bucer, 27 January 1549

Epistola Iohannis Uttenhovii [ad Bucerum,] in qua commendat ei quendam pauperem scholarem vana spe a papisticis allectum posteaque desertum, et narrat missam in aliqua templa in Gallia esse introductam, data Londini 27 Januarii 1549
Letter of Albert Hardenberg to Martin Bucer, 7 September 1550

Epistola Alberti Hardingbergii ad eundem, in qua narrat se eo die a Londino Saxoniam versus iter esse arrepturum, eumque orat ut scripta quaedam sua ei mittat, quorum ope provinciam sibi mandatam in epistolas Paulinas praelegendi facilius impleat, data Lambethae 7 Septembris 1550
Letter of Johannes Fontanus to Martin Bucer, 21 March 1550
Epistola Fontani ad eundem de statu ecclesiae et scholae Argentinensis, data 21 Martii, 1550
Letter of Martin Bucer to Johann Echt, 13 May 1550
Epistola Buceri ad Iohannem Echtium Colonensem medicum in qua narrat ei morbos quibus vexabatur, et petit consilium ejus de remediis contra eos adhibendis, data Cantabrigiae 13 Maii, 1550
Letter of Johann Echt to Martin Bucer
Responsio ut videtur Echtii
Two letters of Andrener to Martin Bucer

Duae epistolae Andreneri (?) ad Bucerum, datae kalendis Septembribus et 23 Decembris in quibus nonnulla remedia ad adversam valetudinem minuendam adhibenda suadet, et quaedam narrat de rebus Germanicis
Letter of Nicholas Cisner to Martin Bucer, 1550
Epistola Nicholai Chisneri ad eundem, in qua varias ecclesiae Germanicae calamitates enarrat, data Heidelberge Nonis Augustis 1550
Letter of Peter Alexander to Martin Bucer
Epistola Petri Alexandri ad eundem, data Lambethae 7 Februarii
Letter of Eustache du Quesnoy to Valerianus Pullus

Epistola Eustachii Quercetani ad Valerianum Pullum; in qua dicit se videre multa mala civitati Genevae impendentia, et orat ut aliquod munus scholasticum sibi apud eum assignetur, data Genevae kalendis Septembribus

msItem.head: Pope Julius III, Bull 'Cum ad tollenda'

head.title: Intimatio concilii futuri apud Tridentem per Julium papam
Letter to Martin Bucer, offering him advice concerning his health, 23 December 1549
Epistola   ad Aretium Felinum [Bucerum,] in qua dat ei consilium de valetudine curanda, data 23 Decembris 1549
Letter of Isaac Cellarius to Martin Bucer
Epistola Isaaci Cellarii ad Bucerum, in qua valde dolet se fuisse demissum a Bucero falso metu percusso ne invitis parentibus matrimonium contraheret, data Argentinae 19 Junii
Letter of John Warner to Peter Martyr concerning the health of Martin Bucer
Epistola Iohannis Warneri ad Petrum Martyrum de infirma Buceri valetudine et remediis ei adhibendis
Letter of Nicholas Cisner to Martin Bucer, 1550
Epistola Nicholai Chisneri ad Bucerum, in qua condolet cum eo de adversa ejus valetudine et narrat quae sibi Heidelburgae acciderant, data Argentorati 7 Idus Apriles 1550

head.title: Letter of Lixobater Balbus to Martin Bucer, 22 March 1550
Epistola Lixabatii Balbi medici ad eundem, in qua narrat statum religionis in Germania, data 22 Martii, 1550
Letter of Sebald Havenreuter to Martin Bucer
Epistola Sebaldi Hansengenteri [apparently written Hauenren terg] ad eundem, data kalendis Septembribus in qua mittit ei consilium de valetudine curanda
Letter of Johann Sleidan to Giordano Bruno concerning affairs in Germany and the future church council
Epistola   ad doctorem Brunonem, partim Germanice partim Latine scripta de rebus Germanicis et concilio futuro
Letter of Remy Guedon to Martin Bucer, 5 April 1550
Epistola Remigii Guedonis typographi ad Bucerum, in qua petit consilium de sua in Angliam migratione, data Frankofordiae 5 Aprilis 1550
Letter of Theobald Schwarz to Martin Bucer and Paul Fagius, 11 September 1549
Epistola Theobaldi Nigri ad Bucerum et Fagium, data 11 Septembris 1549, in qua multa de suis et amicorum rebus domesticis
Letter of Christopher Bol (Soell?), son-in-law of Martin Bucer, to his father-in-law, 5 May 1550
Epistola Christophori Bol generi Buceri ad socerum, in qua narrat conditionem ecclesiae Argentoratensis, data Argentorati 5 Maii, 1550
Letter of Cornelius, his former servant, to Martin Bucer, 1549
Epistola Cornelii quondam famuli Buceri ad eundem de statu ecclesiae, data 5 kalendas Septembri 1549
Letter of Johann Uttenhove to Martin Bucer, January 1549
Epistola Ioannis Utenhovii ad eundem, in qua ei commendat quendam scholarem, data Londini Januario 1549
Letter of Peter Medmann to Martin Bucer, 9 April 1550
Epistola Petri Embdensis ad eundem, in qua queritur quod nullas a Bucero acceperit epistolas, data Embdae 9 Aprilis 1550
Letter of Caspar Hedio to Martin Bucer, 10 September 1549
Epistola Caspari Hedionis ad eundem, in qua suum amorem testatur erga Bucerum, et multa ei narrat de rebus privatis et publicis, data 10 Septembris 1549
Letter of Caspar Schwenckfeld
Epistola Germanica Caspari Schwenckfeld
Letter of Simon Wilhelm Martius to Martin Bucer, 1550

Epistola Simonis Wilhelmi Martii ad Bucerum, in qua Anglos in advenas et peregrines natura feroces et severos esse dicit, orat itaque Bucerum ut commendet eum dominae Elizabethae regis sorori, data Londini 4 kalendas Octobres 1550
Letter from Conrad Hubert to Martin Bucer, 22 December 1549
Epistola Conradi Huberti ad eundem de multis rebus ad Bucerum et amicos pertinentibus, data Argentorati 22 Decembris 1549

msItem.head: Thomas Gray, Scala Chronica (preface)

head.title: Preface to Thomas Gray's Scala Chronica

msItem.incipit: He yt hath delight or vvowd knowe

head.title: Letter from Boniface Wolfard to Marcus Frecht, 1534
Epistola Bonifacii Wuolfard ad Marcum Frechtum, in qua Swenfeldum (Schwenckfeld) hereseos accusatum defendit, data pridie kalendas Maias, 1534
